briefTitle: Nicotine Lozenge or Tobacco-Free Snuff for Smokeless Tobacco Reduction

outcomeMeasures.title: Smokeless Tobacco Reduction Greater or Equal to 50%
outcomeMeasures.description: Percentage of participants who reduced smokeless tobacco use (cans per week) by 50% or more from baseline

outcomeMeasures.title: Tobacco Abstinence at 12 Weeks
outcomeMeasures.description: Number of participants who were biochemically confirmed abstinent from tobacco at week 12 using urinary anabasine less than 2 ng per ml.
